articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Google pulls Gemini from main search app on iOS - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google is pulling its Gemini assistant from the main Google app on iOS, in a bid to encourage users to download the dedicated Gemini app.
articles.content: Google is pulling its AI assistant Gemini from the main Google app for iOS devices. The move is meant to encourage users to download the standalone Gemini app instead, which would allow Google to mor… [+1887 chars]

articles.author: Dino Grandoni
articles.title: We may be able to trap climate pollution in ordinary rocks - The Washington Post
articles.description: Scientists say they have figured out how to transform rocks into something extraordinary: a high-tech, low-cost substance that can bend geological time and help stall — or even reverse — planetary warming.
articles.content:
They look ordinary: gray with a hint of green, the sort of rock you may step over without thinking twice.
